resources.string: Please Register for the first time user.
How do you know when you feel worried?

string-array.name: categories
string-array.item: Anxiety
Anger
Post Traumatic Stress
Depression
Dissociation
Sexual Concerns
Wild Card

string-array.name: Anxiety
string-array.item: Generalized anxiety, hyperarousal, and worry; specific fears; episodes of free-floating anxiety; and a sense of impending danger
1) How do you know when you feel worried?
2) Where do you feel worry in your body?
3) How do you know when you feel scared?
4) Where do you feel fear in your body?
5) What is your greatest fear?
6) What are the things that are scary to you?
7) What are the things you worry about?
8) Who helps you when you are scared?
9) What helps you when you are scared?
10) What would life be like if you did not worry anymore?
11) Is the worry helpful or harmful?
12) What is the difference between worry and fear?
13) How often do you feel worry?
14) How often do you feel fearful?
15) Do you often worry that something bad will happen soon?

string-array.name: Anger
string-array.item: 1) How do you know that you are angry?
2) What actions make you angry?
3) What thoughts make you angry?
4) What happens in your body when you get angry?
5) Who do you trust to talk to when you are angry?
6) What helps you the most when you feel very angry?
7) What helps the most when you are feeling somewhat angry?
8) Does your anger ever make you feel like hurting yourself?
9) Does your anger ever make you feel like hurting someone else?
10) Who do you dislike most and why?
11) When was the last time you raised your voice when you were angry?
12) When was the last time you isolated yourself or avoided others when feeling angry?
13) How would others describe you when you are angry?
14) Does anyone in your life pick fights with you? Who?
15) Do you pick fights with anyone in your life? Who?
16) How long does it take to feel calm after getting very angry?
17) Do you believe you are a mean person?
18) Do you believe others think you are a mean person?

string-array.name: Depression
string-array.item: 1) What makes you cry?
2) When was the last time you cried?
3) Do you like yourself?
4) Do you believe others like you?
5) Do you believe others enjoy spending time with you?
6) Have you ever purposefully hurt yourself? When? How?
7) What helps you when you are feeling sad?
8) Who do you trust to talk to when you are feeling sad?
9) What do you like about yourself?
10) What makes you feel guilty?
11) What makes you feel shameful?
12) Have you ever blamed yourself for bad things that have happened to you?
13) When do you feel lonely?
14) What thoughts contribute to feelings of sadness?
15) What actions contribute to feelings of sadness?
16) When you feel sad, how long does the sadness usually last?
17) Do you know anyone who has purposefully harmed themselves?
18) Do you know anyone who has died by suicide?
19) What are your beliefs regarding self-harm?
20) What are your beliefs regarding suicide?

string-array.name: PostTraumaticStress
string-array.item: 1) Are there people you avoid seeing?
2) Are there things you avoid doing?
3) What happens when you see someone who have been trying to avoid?
4) What happens when you are asked to do something you have been trying to avoid?
5) Do you ever have thoughts that are hard to get out of your head? What are they?
6) When was the last time you had a bad dream?
7) Tell me about the last bad dream you had.
8) What do you do when you have difficult thoughts?
9) What do you do when you have bad dreams?
10) Do you ever try to avoid feeling sad? How?
11) Do you every try to avoid feeling angry? How?
12) Do you ever try to avoid feeling scared? How?
13) What is your worst memory? Why?
14) When do you notice difficult feelings or thoughts?
15) Are memories of the abuse foggy or clear?

string-array.name: Dissociation
string-array.item: 1) Do you daydream?
2) What happens when you daydream?
3) Do you ever feel as if you have lost periods of time?
4) Would you say you are forgetful?
5) What types of things do you forget?
6) When do you notice you are most forgetful?
7) Tell me a story you have created while daydreaming?
8) Have you ever felt like you were outside of or separate from yourself?
9) Have you ever desired or pretended to be someone else? Who?
10) Have you ever pretended to be somewhere else? Where?
11) Is it difficult to talk about emotions?
12) Is it difficult to talk about the sexual abuse that occurred?
13) Is it difficult to feel emotions?
14) Do some emotions feel safer than others to access?
15) Do you ever feel numb?

string-array.name: SexualConcerns
string-array.item: 1) Are there places or experiences that trigger memories your sexual abuse? What are they?
2) Are you fearful of sexual abuse occurring again?
3) Do you ever feel to blame for the sexual abuse? Why?
4) Do you still have to see your abuser?
5) Do you think about sex? If so, what are the thoughts?
6) Do you ever experience sexual feelings in your body?
7) Do you ever feel like you have sexual impulses you cannot control?
8) Do you ever feel like you have thoughts regarding sex that you cannot get out of your head?
9) How do you feel when you hear others talking about sex?
10) Are there safe areas of your body that others may touch?
11) Are there boundaries you want to implement that may help you feel safer?
12) Do you have particular fears regarding men or women?
13) Do you believe that others intend to hurt you?

string-array.name: WildCard
string-array.item: 1) What brings you joy?
2) What is your favorite memory? Why?
3) Name 3 things that you like about yourself.
4) Name 3 things that you believe you do well.
5) What are qualities of someone who is trustworthy?
6) What are qualities of a good friend?
7) Describe a place that brings feelings of safety or comfort (can be imagined or real)? What makes that place special?
8) Breathe.
9) Who or what brings you comfort?
10) What are some favorite things to do for fun?
11) Who do you like to spend time with the most?
12) When do you need to be alone?
13) When do you most want to be with others?
14) Tell me about the last thing you created.
15) Tell me about your favorite song.
16) What would you say to a friend that experienced sexual abuse?
17) Create a mantra or saying that may be helpful when you are experiencing difficult thoughts or feelings.
18) If you could have any superpower what would it be?

string-array.name: names
string-array.item: Select a Category
Anxiety
Anger
Post Traumatic Stress
Dissociation
Sexual Concern
